blogPost.excerpt: Straw.Page is an extremely simple website builder, focused on creativity. You can use it to design awesome websites straight from your phone

blogPost.title: Straw.Page - Extremely simple website builder
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Straw.Page是一款极其简单的网站建设工具，专注于创意。你可以用它直接从你的手机上设计出很棒的网站。
